markets.title: Will the Lok Sabha Elections 2025 see a voter turnout higher than 70%?
markets.description: This market predicts whether the upcoming Lok Sabha Elections in 2025 will achieve a voter turnout exceeding 70% across all constituencies. The resolution will be based on official Election Commission of India data.

markets.title: Will Pawan Kalyan publicly criticize Mamata Banerjee's 'ganda dharma' remark again before December 31st, 2025?
markets.description: This market predicts whether Andhra Deputy CM Pawan Kalyan will issue another public statement criticizing Mamata Banerjee's controversial 'ganda dharma' remark before the end of 2025.

markets.title: Will the RBI announce an interest rate cut in the next monetary policy meeting by August 2025?
markets.description: This market predicts whether the Reserve Bank of India will reduce the repo rate in their next scheduled monetary policy committee meeting before August 2025.

markets.title: Will Bitcoin reach $150,000 USD by December 31st, 2025?
markets.description: This market predicts whether Bitcoin will reach or exceed $150,000 USD on any major cryptocurrency exchange before the end of 2025.

markets.title: Will ISRO successfully launch Chandrayaan-4 mission by December 31st, 2025?
markets.description: This market predicts whether the Indian Space Research Organisation will successfully launch the Chandrayaan-4 lunar mission before the end of 2025.

markets.title: Will there be a major climate agreement signed by at least 50 countries by December 31st, 2025?
markets.description: This market predicts whether a significant international climate agreement will be signed by at least 50 countries before the end of 2025.

markets.title: Will Andrew Tate be convicted of at least one charge by December 31st, 2025?
markets.description: This market predicts whether Andrew Tate will be convicted of at least one of the charges brought against him by the UK Crown Prosecution Service.

markets.title: Will India win more than 15 medals at the 2025 World Athletics Championships?
markets.description: This market predicts whether the Indian athletics team will secure more than 15 medals at the 2025 World Athletics Championships.

markets.title: Will NEET 2025 exam be conducted without any major controversies or paper leaks?
markets.description: This market predicts whether the NEET 2025 examination will be conducted smoothly without any significant controversies, paper leaks, or legal challenges.

markets.title: Will Reliance Industries announce a major acquisition worth over $10 billion by December 31st, 2025?
markets.description: This market predicts whether Reliance Industries will officially announce an acquisition deal valued at more than $10 billion before the end of 2025.

markets.title: Will Delhi's air quality index remain below 200 for at least 30 consecutive days during winter 2025?
markets.description: This market predicts whether Delhi will achieve an Air Quality Index below 200 for a continuous period of 30 days during the winter season of 2025.
